CarbuRe est un service num√©rique de l'√: CarbuRe is a state digital service incubated at the Fabrique Num√©rique of the Ministry of the Ecological Transition, member of the incubator network <2>beta.gouv.fr</2>
Transmettre des donn√©es fiables pour as: Share reliable data to ensure the development of environmentally friendly alternative fuels.
Carbure est un outil d√©velopp√© par le: Carbure is a tool developed by the French Ministry of Ecological Transition that allows actors in the sector to easily exchange information about the sustainability of biofuels circulating in France. The tool also provides anonymous public statistics about biofuels incorporated into fossil fuels in France.

l'inspecteur confirme avoir trouv√© le p: The inspector confirms having found the recharge point for the location indicated.Write "yes" or "no" and go to the following steps if the infrastructure has been located;
Identifiant renseign√© visible √† proxim: Visible informed identifier in the immediate vicinity of the infrastructure :
l'inspecteur pr√©cise si l'identifiant r: The inspector specifies if the identifier informed is visible on or in the immediate vicinity of the charging point.The non -visibility of this identifier should not prevent the control if the inspector is able to identify the recharge points by other means (indication of the developer/operator for example).Write "yes" or "no" ;

l'inspecteur v√©rifie la correspondance: The inspector checks the correspondence between the examination certificate of the type declared by the applicant (recalled in the column "No_mid") and that of the counter installed in the recharge point.It leaves the box empty in case of correspondence or indicates the meter number installed if a difference is noted ;
